gw.api.rest.validation

Interface JsonValidatorContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ValidatorContext

    public interface JsonValidatorContext
extends ValidatorContext
    This context object is passed to JsonObjectValidators, and JsonPropertyValidators, and can be used to report errors.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BUNDLE 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addObjectError(@NotNull java.lang.String messageKey, java.lang.Object... messageArgs)
      Reports a validation error associated with the line number of the validated object.
      void addPropertyError(@NotNull java.lang.String messageKey, java.lang.Object... messageArgs)
      Reports a validation error associated with the line number of the validated property, if any.
      JsonSchemaDefinition getSchemaDefinition()
      The JsonSchemaDefinition for the object currently being validated
      JsonSchemaItems getSchemaItems()
      The JsonSchemaItems for the element currently being validated, or null if an object or property validator is currently being invoked
      JsonSchemaProperty getSchemaProperty()
      The JsonSchemaProperty for the property currently being validated, or null if an object-level validator is currently being invoked

      • Methods inherited from interface gw.api.rest.validation.ValidatorContext

        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • addPropertyError

        void addPropertyError(@NotNull @PropertyKey(resourceBundle="locale.display")
                      @NotNull java.lang.String messageKey,
                      @NotNull
                      java.lang.Object... messageArgs)
        Reports a validation error associated with the line number of the validated property, if any. If the property line number is unknown, either because the property was not specified on the input or because this JsonValidatorContext is being used with a JsonObjectValidator, the object's line number will be used.
        Parameters:
        messageKey - the display key to use for the error message
        messageArgs - the arguments to that display key, if any

      • addObjectError

        void addObjectError(@NotNull @PropertyKey(resourceBundle="locale.display")
                    @NotNull java.lang.String messageKey,
                    @NotNull
                    java.lang.Object... messageArgs)
        Reports a validation error associated with the line number of the validated object.
        Parameters:
        messageKey - the display key to use for the error message
        messageArgs - the arguments to that display key, if any

      • getSchemaProperty

        JsonSchemaProperty getSchemaProperty()
        The JsonSchemaProperty for the property currently being validated, or null if an object-level validator is currently being invoked

        JsonSchemaItems getSchemaItems()
